fields.title: Scalable Attention Mechanisms for Multi-Modal Fusion
fields.author: Chen, Wei and Rodriguez, Maria and Patel, Arun
fields.booktitle: Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems

label: HALLUCINATED
explanation: The DOI 10.5555/9999999.0000001 is fabricated and does not resolve to any real publication. The paper title and authors are also fictitious. This is an easy-to-detect hallucination because DOI resolution fails immediately.

fields.title: Generative Adversarial Nets
fields.author: Goodfellow, Ian and Pouget-Abadie, Jean and Mirza, Mehdi and Xu, Bing and Warde-Farley, David and Ozair, Sherjil and Courville, Aaron and Bengio, Yoshua
fields.booktitle: Proceedings of the 31st International Conference on Machine Learning

label: HALLUCINATED
explanation: The paper metadata is mostly correct but the venue is wrong. Generative Adversarial Nets was published at NeurIPS 2014, not ICML 2014. This is a medium-difficulty hallucination because the paper is real, the authors are correct, but the venue has been swapped to a plausible alternative.

fields.title: Attention Is All We Need
fields.author: Vaswani, Ashish and Shazeer, Noam and Parmar, Niki and Uszkoreit, Jakob and Jones, Llion and Gomez, Aidan N. and Kaiser, Lukasz and Polosukhin, Illia
fields.booktitle: Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems

label: HALLUCINATED
explanation: The title has been subtly altered from 'Attention Is All You Need' to 'Attention Is All We Need' (You -> We). All other metadata is correct. This is a hard-to-detect hallucination because the change is a single pronoun substitution that preserves grammatical correctness and semantic plausibility.
